column1: ££This has to be the most beautiful tree I have ever seen...
...my love: you have been gone so long...come find me
$$poor lady must've lost her kitten...you know when I was a kitten -
$$aaaoooo watch out! Tree training is beginning!...
$$...those trees look kinda spooky to the right...
$$I recon its the sort of place a ghost would hang out!
